message.name: ERR_ADMINASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_XFV_START_CREATION_DATE
message.locale: Start date must not be earlier than creation date.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENTRULESLINK_FV_SELECT_RULES_SET
message.locale: You must select the Rules Set to assign to this Assessment

message.name: ERR_ASSESSMENTRULESLINK_XRV_PERIOD_OVERLAP
message.locale: The period of this rules set overlaps with that of an existing rules set assignment for this assessment configuration.

message.name: ERR_ADMINASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_ASSESSMENT_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter an assessment name

message.name: ERR_ADMINASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_ASSESSMENT_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter an assessment type

message.name: ERR_ADMINASSESSMENTCONFIGURATION_ASSESSMENT_IDENTIFIER_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a home page identifier
